name: Mortuary Mop Madness
description:
Our entry for the "Mundane Jam (8 Bits to Infinity)" Game Jam!

  • https://8bitstoinfinity.com/

  • Game-Jam topic: Decay - Mundane
  • From the 12th - 22nd  of March 2021
  • Crew:
    • Code: Victor Santillan (Vluk1)
    • Music: Michael Rawcliffe
    • Art: Jimmy Franke (Steamless)

"At the Mortuary Motel, cleaning standards are a daily struggle. The guests/deceased find themselves ever on the cusp of taking their business elsewhere, to a less sullied establishment.

Fortunately, Jan the Janitor, is always on hand to bring the building back up to scratch. Sweating through the nightshift the polishing protagonist pledges to keep the floors scrubbed, the rats at bay and the dead happy and cold in their refrigerators.

Move with WASD or Arrow Keys. When you move you leave a trail of clorox, perfect for keeping clean. Make sure the deade touch it so they know this is a clean place.

Catch the rats with the same clorox trail!

The game end when youur cleaning shift ends. Only then, you will know if your mopping skills are good enough!"

Good luck Jan, the Janitor!!

Give us a review if you feel like it :D

To play:

  • Download the .rar file (virus not included!)
  • Use winrar to unzipp it. In case you dont have winrar, we advice u to download it.
  • Double click on "8bitJam-Morgue.exe" to start the game
  • Bugs will appear, since the game is still on beta :D
    • To play after the time is up, just close the game and reopen it again :)
